name: Let's Fart Brandon: Browser (Hammergames_browser)
description:
Let's Fart Brandon is a free funny horror/comedy game featuring Mr Biden and his infamous farts.

The Story:

Mr. Biden falls asleep at a conference and has nightmares. In the world of his nightmare, his only weapon is fart.

Game Features:

  • Funny top down actin horror/comedy gameplay
  • Easy to pick up and play
  • For fans of fun and comedy games
  • Suitable for both female and male players
  • Unique surreal nightmare world with sense of humor

For windows version with higher graphic, go here:

https://hammergames.itch.io/lets-fart-brandon
